name: Lazin Around
description:
Welcome to LazinAround

LazinAround is a puzzle game that will put your laser puzzling and color theory skills to the test. Master the increasingly complex puzzles by manipulating multiple lasers into a single color.

Join Colored Lasers

Figure out how to combine different colored lasers together to hit the matching colored targets.

Hit Matching Targets

Hitting the matching colored target is the goal. Just don't hit them with the wrong color.

Filter Out Unwanted Colors

Use the colored filter crystals to tune the lasers to the proper color.
